releaseMessage: You can listen to "Lo siento, pero no" now!

gig.title: Atalaya Roja + Sweet Q
gig.text: On Sunday, April 21st, we will be accompanying 'Atalaya Roja' at the presentation of their new work 'Cabo de las tormentas' in a very special morning concert. It'll be a vermouth session with appetizers, where children under 9 enter for free and those under 16 at a special price. So, if you have young children and want to make a different plan, we will be waiting for you!

info.title: Lo siento, pero no
info.subtitle: Already available
info.text: You can already listen in every platform 'Lo siento, pero no', third single from our future record. A rallying theme that boldly challenges intolerance with strength and clarity through direct and powerful lyrics.

pressKit.title: Press kit
pressKit.text: Here you can download our press kit

videoclip.title: Coming soon...
videoclip.text: Soon we will release our third videoclip 'Las cosas claras'. Stay tuned with our social networks!

stayTuned: At this time we haven't any gig scheduled soon. Stay tuned!

atrapado.title: Behind the Scenes of 'Trapped in Time'
atrapado.subtitle: Premiere on Youtube
atrapado.text: Discover how the recording of our latest single took place and experience it from within. As if you were one more member of the band!

presave.title: Lo siento, pero no
presave.subtitle: Release on March 29th
presave.text: On next March 29th we will be releasing 'Lo siento, pero no', third single from our future record. A rallying theme that boldly challenges intolerance with strength and clarity through direct and powerful lyrics. Be the first to listen!

mercadoMotores.title: Mercado de Motores
mercadoMotores.subtitle: Full show on Youtube
mercadoMotores.text: You can already watch our latest full live show at Mercado de Motores in our Youtube channel. If you want to hear our new forthcoming releases in a live format... Don't miss it out!
